body.p:
There are three ways to input manufacturing downtime into Sight Machine. Each of these three ways is used by a different role at your organization.
Managers and QA lab technicians: Batch downtime entry on the Sight Machine Data Tab
Line Operators: Manual real-time, downtime entry using a tablet
Automated Downtime Inspection: Through machine input automated inspection
body.note: While downtime input is done in essentially the three above ways no matter the product, the Sight Machine application is flexible enough to consume input from virtually any input device. Whether you're measuring downtime for machines that build steering column lock assemblies or top-stitching on soccer shoes, Sight Machine has a way to input that downtime and to view it in the application.
